member.name: M:UtilityPack.Connections.Ftp.FtpConnection.ElaboratePath(System.String)
member.summary:
Giving a local path elaborate it further and return a list.
If the passed path is just a file the list will contains only it
If the passed path is a folder the list will contains every file inside that folder
